name: MindSweeper (itch)
description:
While it is true that the mines were placed in the field, their is a much more pressing matter. We must sweep your mind.

How to play:

The goal of the game is to unveil all the tiles that do not contain a mine. Accidentally unavailing a mine will cause you to loose.

Once you unveil a tile, it will show you numbers. The number indicates how many mines are adjacent or across. If a tile has the number 3 on it, and their are only 3 spots near by, you can conclude all 3 tiles have a mine.

Once you have found a mine, you can flag it to indicate it's location.

Once you know where all the mines surrounding a spot are located, you can safely assume that the other locations do not contain a mine.

Controls:

For mouse control, Right click to uncover a location, Left click to flag a spot.

For touch input, touch the mine icon on the left to unveil tiles or the flag icon to place warning flags on mines. Then touch a spot to do the action.
